articles.content:

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 debacle costs founders US$1 billion of wealth - BNN
articles.description: The technical glitches plaguing CD Projekt SA’s Cyberpunk 2077 game have cut more than $1 billion off the wealth of the company’s founders. Perhaps more seriously, the quality-first image of the studio has been shaken, and may not be easy to win back.
